Referred to the Subcommittee on the Constitution, Civil Rights, and Civil Liberties.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Constitution and Limited Government

official_title: Recognizing the importance of establishing a national "Fred Korematsu Day of Civil Liberties and the Constitution".
subjects: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues
subjects_top_term: Civil rights and liberties, minority issues

summary.text:
This resolution recognizes the importance of establishing a national Fred Korematsu Day of Civil Liberties and the Constitution.

It also encourages all people to reflect on the importance of political leadership and vigilance and on the values of justice and civil rights during times of uncertainty and emergency.

titles.title: Recognizing the importance of establishing a national "Fred Korematsu Day of Civil Liberties and the Constitution".
